ext_description.message: WOT helps you find trustworthy websites based on millions of users’ experiences and is one of Chrome’s most popular add-ons.

fbl_optout_text.message: If you prefer not to be asked questions, click "yes"

fbl_whatisthis_text.message: Web of Trust (WOT) is working to promote safety and quality across the web for millions of users. You can help by submitting your opinions whenever you see this prompt.

messages_failed.message: Failed to load ratings; retrying shortly.

ratingwindow_invite_rw.message: You can rate websites using this tool. Click on the colored bars to express how much you trust a website.

ratingwindow_newversion.message: New version available - click to update

warnings_gotosite.message: Ignore warning and go to the site

warnings_ratesite.message: This site is safe - I want to rate it

warnings_rating.message:
You have given this site a poor rating,
which triggered a warning

warnings_reputation.message:
This site has a poor reputation based on
user ratings

warnings_unknown.message: This site has an unknown rating

wt_donut_msg.message:
Follow the traffic lights!

Safe surfing tool WOT shows website reputations based on experiences from millions of users.

Traffic lights after web links guide you to find sites that you can trust: green for good, red for bad, yellow as a warning to be cautious.

wt_intro_0_msg.description: This message appears on introduction welcome tip right after the add-on was installed
wt_intro_0_msg.message:
You are protected!

Safe surfing tool Web of Trust (WOT) shows which websites you can trust based on millions of users' experiences.

Click the icon {ICO1} on your browser toolbar to start using WOT.

{WT_LEARNMORE}

wt_rw_text.message:
WOT shows website reputations based on experiences from millions of users.

Leave your own rating by clicking the colored bars to indicate what you think of the site. Your rating helps other users surf safer.

Learn more about WOT.

wt_warning_text.description: this is a WelcomeTip which is shown when a user sees Warning first time
wt_warning_text.message:
Be aware of untrustworthy sites!

Safe surfing tool WOT shows you a warning if you land on a site that has a bad reputation based on user ratings.

{WT_LEARNMORE}

If you don't want to see warnings, you can turn them off.
